title: Practice Challenge

commonMistakes.consequence: const getFullName = first, last => ... causes a syntax error.
commonMistakes.correction: Use parentheses: const getFullName = (first, last) => first + ' ' + last

commonMistakes.consequence: const square = x => { x * x } returns undefined.
commonMistakes.correction: Either omit braces for implicit return, or add return keyword.

commonMistakes.mistake: Adding parentheses with single parameter unnecessarily
commonMistakes.consequence: Not an error, just less concise.
commonMistakes.correction: For one param, parentheses are optional: const square = x => x * x
